thread.title: Former Baseball Player Keith Hernandez on Navigating the Summer of Love

author: Marc Myers
title: Former Baseball Player Keith Hernandez on Navigating the Summer of Love
text:
Keith Hernandez, 64, is a former Major League Baseball first baseman who won two World Series titles. He is a Mets TV analyst on SNY, and is the author of the memoir “I’m Keith Hernandez” (Little, Brown). He spoke with Marc Myers.
When I was little, my older brother, Gary, was forced to read a book a week in fourth grade. The books he liked he threw on my bed when he was finished with them. This continued throughout my childhood and made me a reader for life.
...
